alert.note: Alert for City of Chesapeake; City of Virginia Beach (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 8:34PM EDT until May 06 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM EDT FOR ...THE EAST CENTRAL CITY OF CHESAPEAKE AND THE CITY OF VIRGINIA BEACH... At 834 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles northeast of Norfolk International to near Virginia Beach, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Virginia Beach, Chesapeake, Princess Anne, Rudee Heights, Princess Anne Plaza, Sigma, Sandbridge Beach, Oceana NAS, Macons Corner, Pungo, Bayside, Oceana, North Virginia Beach, Dam Neck, Gallups Corner and London Bridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southeastern Virginia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: City of Chesapeake; City of Virginia Beach
